Property Listing.heading: Property Listing Made Easy
Property Listing.body: Property listing doctype allows real estate businesses to create and manage property listings, including property details, images, and price information. This makes it easy to keep track of available properties and update listings as needed.

Tenant Management.heading: All-in-One Solution for Tenant Management
Tenant Management.body: Tenant management helps real estate businesses manage tenant information, lease agreements, and rent payments. This makes it easy to keep track of tenant information and ensure that rent payments are made on time.
